has research problem.from sentence: COMBINING LOCAL CONVOLUTION WITH GLOBAL SELF - ATTENTION FOR READING COMPRE - HENSION

has research problem: machine reading and question answering ( Q&A )

has research problem.from sentence: Current end - to - end machine reading and question answering ( Q&A ) models are primarily based on recurrent neural networks ( RNNs ) with attention .
There is growing interest in the tasks of machine reading comprehension and automated question answering .
In this paper , aiming to make the machine comprehension fast , we propose to remove the recurrent nature of these models .
